name: Mad Caps
description:
Unbottle the fun in Mad Caps, a matching game gone mad!

Flip bottle caps for fun to make matches of three or more to fill the fizzy meter. Swap caps vertically, horizontally, or diagonally to score big points and find cool bonuses in this addictive puzzle game.

Three fun game modes Classic, Arcade, and Survival quench your thirst for fun. Test your time and your memory skills in quick bonus round challenges, and choose from four difficulty levels.

Seven bonuses help you make more matches and eliminate obstacles as they set off chain reactions. Activate aliens to transform surrounding caps, fire ray guns to zap those pesky black caps, or aim your rocket to eliminate entire rows or columns of caps.

Addictive matching madness awaits in Mad Caps!


Key Features:
•Unlimited play lets you match again and again
•Three game modes: Classic, Arcade, Survival
•4 difficulty levels let you test your skills
•Bonus memory matching game
•7 bonus caps help you score big
•Collect letters and bonus points for uncovering the Mystery Word
•Plan ahead to flip for your best move
•Fun soundtrack and effects
